SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into discount (SOURCE_CODE, DISCOUNT_TYPE, DISCOUNT_ID, DISCOUNT_CODE, DISCOUNT_MONEY, EXPIRE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, DESC_REMARK, DISCOUNT_RANGE_DESC, USE_URL, DISCOUNT_USE_TYPE, DISTRIBUTION_STATUS, PERCENT_OFF ) values (#{sourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expire,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{descRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountRangeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountUseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{distributionStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{percentOff,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: update discount set SOURCE_CODE = #{sourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCOUNT_TYPE = #{discountType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DISCOUNT_ID = #{discountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCOUNT_CODE = #{discountCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCOUNT_MONEY = #{discountMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXPIRE = #{expire,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESC_REMARK = #{descRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCOUNT_RANGE_DESC = #{discountRangeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_URL = #{useUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCOUNT_USE_TYPE = #{discountUseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DISTRIBUTION_STATUS = #{distributionStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PERCENT_OFF = #{percentOff,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, SOURCE_CODE, DISCOUNT_TYPE, DISCOUNT_ID, DISCOUNT_CODE, DISCOUNT_MONEY, EXPIRE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, DESC_REMARK, DISCOUNT_RANGE_DESC, USE_URL, DISCOUNT_USE_TYPE, DISTRIBUTION_STATUS, PERCENT_OFF from discount where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
